verbose_text: Although methionine oxidation can occur ex vivo during sample processing (i.e., its significance is unclear) and phosphorylation has been reported at Tyr 67 XREF_BIBR, both phosphorylation at Thr 19 and HNE adduction of DJ-1 are novel and potentially important to PD pathogenesis in addition to their utility as biomarkers.
evidence: phosphorylation at Thr-19 and HNE adduction of DJ-1
